Fig. 1.  Effect of  Cu concentration on  the growth  of M. trichosporium OB3b. M. trichosporium OB3b was grown  in  the mineral salts medium at  30~  under  methane-air (1:4 v/v%).  The  flask, were  agitated on  a  rotary shaker table maintained at  120  rpm. Cu concentration in  the medium:  [], 0.21 ~tM;  GLYPH<14>9  1.25 ~tM;  A,  20  ~tM.

Fig. 3. Effect of  cyclopropanol concentration on  pMMO activity and  MDH activity. The  pMMO activity (o) was measured  by  propene  epoxidation assay. The reaction mixture  contains cell suspension (34.6 mg dry  cell/mL), propylene (112  ~tmol), sodium  formate (14.3 mM), and  various concentrations of  cyclopropanol in  phosphate buffer (12.9 mM), pH 7.0. The  MDH activity (GLYPH<14> 9   was  measured by  methanol oxidation assay. The reaction mixture contains cell suspension (34.6 mg dry  cell/mL), methanol (18 ~tmol), and  various concentrations of cyclopropanol in phosphate buffer (22  mM), pH 7.0. The  reaction was carried out  at 30~  The  total volume  of  reaction mixture was  3.5 mL.
